title: Silica-coated LiYF4:Yb3+, Tm3+ upconverting nanoparticles are non-toxic and activate minor stress responses in mammalian cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8695-8708
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08869C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kais Bietar, Siwei Chu, Gabrielle Mandl, Emma Zhang, Naim Chabaytah, Renata Sabelli, John A. Capobianco, Ursula Stochaj
Silica-coated lanthanide-doped upconverting nanoparticles (UCNPs) are internalized by mammalian cells. The bipyramidal UCNPs are non-toxic and elicit minor stress responses in a cell type-dependent fashion.
